steps.name: Input Files
steps.description:
Add the PSG files you want to perform the analysis on.

The PSG file and the accessory file must share the same filename and folder.

Open your files:
.edf : .tsv file is optional.
.sts : .sig file is mandatory.
.eeg for CEAMS user : NATUS subject folder is mandatory


Select the montage and channels

steps.name: Events Exlusion
steps.description: Select events to exclude from the analysis

steps.name: Filter Settings
steps.description: Define the filter settings for the analysis.

steps.name: Connectivity Settings
steps.description: Define the connectivity settings for your study

steps.name: Output Files
steps.description: Select the path to indicate where the output files will be saved.

alias.tooltip: List of aliases separated by a semicolon(;) character

file_selection_only.tooltip: Set it to 1 if you only need to select a file and not its montages and channels.
